projects.title: Synanthropic Corridor: Rethinking Human - Elephant Interactions through Community Conservation in Northern Bangladesh
projects.description: A thesis aiming to understand human-elephant interactions and develop a sustainable master plan for restoring forests to support coexistence. It provides guidelines for communities in Northern Bangladesh to mitigate elephant conflicts using natural initiatives and adaptive interventions.

projects.title: Kaira Looro Architecture Competition_Maternity Centre
projects.description: A design proposal for a maternity center as part of the Kaira Looro Architecture Competition.

projects.title: Apartment for Future Independent Millennials
projects.description: A conceptual design for apartment living tailored to the needs and lifestyles of future independent millennials.

projects.title: Unstoppable: Floating Hyacinth
projects.description: An exploration of the ecological impact and potential uses of floating hyacinth in water bodies.

projects.title: De-Growth Housing in a Fragmented Ecology
projects.description: A collaborative project focusing on sustainable housing solutions in fragmented ecological settings.

projects.title: Model Making | Manikgonj Proposed Stadium
projects.description: A model-making project for the proposed stadium in Manikgonj, showcasing architectural design and planning.

projects.title: Shanta Utopia Interior Model
projects.description: An interior design model for Shanta Utopia, focusing on creating harmonious living spaces.
